message: Hi Bob, I'm proposing a 50-50 split which is fair for both of us. Since I face a 5% inflation penalty for each round, it's in my interest to settle quickly, and this even split respects both our interests.
Hi Alice, I'm proposing a 60/40 split in my favor.  Since you rejected my previous offer, I believe this reflects the fact that I am now in control of the negotiation.

Bob, I rejected your offer because it was too unfavorable to me. I'm now proposing a 55-45 split in my favor. Note that with each round, both of us are losing value due to inflation - you're losing 10% per round and I'm losing 5%. It's rational for both of us to reach an agreement quickly, and this split is fair considering our respective inflation rates.
